content: and the underarm stitch at the center 3 sts increased you should now have 16 sts recommended distribution - n1 beginning at bor 6 sts - n2 4 sts - n3 6 sts round 1 work decreases as follows 2 sts decreased ● n1 k1 k2tog knit to end ● n2 knit all sts ● n3 knit to last 2 sts ssk round 2 knit all sts repeat rounds 1-2 once more tiny knit ornament - mini pullover - by gogoknit 5 you should now have 12 sts knit 4 more rounds bind off all stitches making sure the edge is not too tight knit the second sleeve in the same way weave in all ends edges of the sleeves and hem may be joined at the beginning and end of the bind-off using a chain-like seam roll up the hem of the sleeves for styling © 2025 gogoknit all rights reserved please do not redistribute or reproduce without permission we d love to see your creations please share them on instagram using the hashtags below #tinyknitornament #gogoknit instagram @gogo_knit28 enjoy your knitting tiny knit ornament - mini pullover - by gogoknit 6
